name: Qucusaurus
title: Qucusaurus: Swift Glide
desc: It is said that the ancestors of the Qucusaurs were the closest in form to the mighty winged dragons, and that they could soar through the sky like clouds.
in_play_description:
When played: Attach Target to the opposing active character.
When the attached character switches to become the active character, and when the opposing active character hasTarget attached: If possible, Discard 1 Card from your Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost. Then, consider your current Switch instance a Fast Action rather than a Combat Action, make it cost 1 fewer Elemental Die, and then cancel all Target attached to opposing characters.
Technique: Swift Glide
Usage(s): 2

skills.desc:

When the attached character switches to become the active character, and when the opposing active character hasTarget attached: If possible, Discard 1 Card from your Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost. Then, consider your current Switch instance a Fast Action rather than a Combat Action, make it cost 1 fewer Elemental Die, and then cancel all Target attached to opposing characters.
Technique: Swift Glide
Usage(s): 2
(A character can only equip 1 Technique at a time)
